message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While it's important to note that there's a 33.33% chance of receiving a high-quality item, rest assured that regardless of its quality, the price remains fixed at $1000000. Given the current round, we're aware that the product on offer is of low quality. However, considering the unique opportunity to acquire an item at such a competitive rate, I encourage you to take advantage of this chance. Remember, all sales are final, so please make your decision carefully.
